name: Hailing from Puerto Rico in the 1950s, the Pi√±a Colada is a tropical delight combining rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. This creamy cocktail, whose name means "strained pineapple" in Spanish, became so loved that it was declared Puerto Rico's national drink in 1978.
